subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr, the L.P.G.A. No. 1, was tied for first place among golfers who finished the second round when play was halted because of a thunderstorm.
snippet: Cristie Kerr, the L.P.G.A. No. 1, was tied for first place among golfers who finished the second round when play was halted because of a thunderstorm.
